result.reason: Core maintainer feature request for variable replacement UI helper (autocomplete/intellisense) in text fields that support %TOKEN% variables, improving discoverability of available tokens.
result.approach: Add an autocomplete popup or dropdown helper that shows available %VARIABLE% tokens when editing external tool fields, with live preview of resolved values for the selected connection. Could reuse the existing token list from ExternalToolArgumentParser.

attempts.raw_output:
This is a feature request from a core maintainer (sparerd) asking for a UI helper (autocomplete/intellisense-style) when editing text fields that support `%VARIABLE%` tokens. This is a significant UI enhancement.
